meanings.definition: To remove parasitic worms from (an animal)
meanings.sent1: The vet will deworm the puppy to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent2: It is important to deworm your pets regularly to prevent infections.
meanings.sent3: The little dog joked that he needed to deworm his stuffed animals too!
meanings.sent4: She felt like deworming her mind from negative thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Deworming the garden of pests made the plants thrive.

meanings.sent2: The deworm of the cat went smoothly at the veterinary clinic.
meanings.sent3: The deworm at the zoo turned into a fun educational event for visitors.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to deworming the community of parasites was commendable.
